entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a SUPPORT.MD #103936
  • `System.Double.IsRealNumber(System.Double.PositiveInfinity)` is true #103930
  • Investigate combinations of null and empty password support in a PFX #103929
    9.0.0
  • Consider doing PEM reads with unified code in the new certificate loader #103928
    9.0.0
  • Expose Json in SqlDbType #103925
  • Decide on a policy for duplicate attributes on PKCS12 values #103924
    9.0.0
  • JIT differences in reporting call sites in GC info #103917
  • [metadata] Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #103913
    9.0.0
  • It's possible for handles to not be Dispose()d if AnonymousPipeServerStream.Create throws #103912
  • Process terminated. Assertion failed. in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103911
  • Normalize JIT usages of array length calcuation #103908
    Future
  • Is it safe to do this volatile++ operation in WebSocketBuffer? #103907
  • ILLink handling of `Type.GetType` doesn't resolve types from corelib #103906
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonWriter.WriteNumberValue<TNumber> #103905
    10.0.0
  • AOT compiler crashes with invalid input #103901
  • AV in GcInfoDecoder #103894
  • HttpClient spans don't show up as exemplars #103893
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Could not execute the method because either the method itself or the containing type is not fully instantiated. #103891
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `IsEnumeratorActive` in `System.Text.SpanLineEnumerator` #103886
  • [API Proposal]: bool HashSet.Add(T, out T actualValue) #103885
  • Conditional Compilation and XmlSerialization #103880
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.AiaTests.AiaAcceptsCertTypesAndIgnoresNonCertTypes #103879
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce isolation in AssemblyLoadContext #103878
  • Test failure: GC\\Scenarios\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout.cmd #103874

Closed

  • Extend the MinOpts/GCtracking tweak to more platforms #7542
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'block->bbPreorderNum == preorderNum' during 'Early Value Propagation' #103888
  • FieldAccessor can't read RVA field correctly #103207
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd Linux x64 #101065
  • [8.0] "Stream aborted by peer" failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #103264
    8.0.x
  • [Test Failure] System.IO.Tests.InternalBufferSizeTests.FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize #103753
  • [API Proposal]: Support fingers-crossed mode for logging. #101054
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add new Environment properties to detect argv[0] #101872
  • Test failure: GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #103875
    9.0.0
  • System.AppContext.GetData is not optimized for reads #94894
  • BigInteger unsigned right shift operation is poorly designed and exposes implementation details #91169
  • Suggestion: Runtime support for faster BigInteger #97199
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks #98505
  • IComparable<T>.CompareTo<T> inconsistencies #99722
  • ITrigonometricFunctions is missing Atan2 #100816

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Subtract prior entry size when adding entry to cache #103931
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Remove Module::IsManifest and IsPEFile #103921
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix detection of lambda and local function generated names #103916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update mono to support Unsafe.BitCast #103915
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Handle QMARK properly for LCL_ADDR propagation #103909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove allocation of state machine in QuicStream.WriteAsync #103902
    area-System.Net
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [WIP] [ios/tvos] Testing GetSpecialFolder behavior #103899
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add spacing in SemaphoreSlim doc comments #103897
    documentation, area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103896
    needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103895
    needs-area-label
  • Add troubleshooting guideline link to PNSE in Quic #103890
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi][mono] Fix conflicting naming for wasm import/export #103881
    area-Interop-mono
  • Disable cleanup of RuntimeThreadLocals during shutdown #103877
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update dotnet-pgo.md #103926
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update dotnet-pgo.md #103927
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • jit-format job fixes #103910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update dotnet-pgo.md #103923
    needs-area-label
  • Don't fold relops with side effects that are used in jumps #103903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky FSW test #103873
    area-System.IO
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to preview 7 #103789
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Fix debug flowgraph check for un-compacted blocks #103904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Define JIT format jobs as GitHub Actions instead of AzDO jobs #103846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark generic arguments for unresolved generic types #103844
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Relax threshold in GC Regressions test #103898
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce some allocations in SslStream handshake. #103814
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILCompiler: don't strip debug info from 'ilc' during source-build. #103760
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make DAC return Module instead of PEAssembly for DacpModuleData::PEAssembly #103821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103804
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize a few more conversions in TensorPrimitives.ConvertXx #103820
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Set callconv in unicodedata callback and update doc #103852
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not fold exported UnmanagedCallersOnly symbols #103884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Handle ConvertTo* APIs properly #103876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Length guard in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange #102484
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add riscv64 arch to tracing/eventpipe/processinfo tests #103832
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 126.0.6478.114, windows: 126.0.6478.63 #103858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set alignment=1 for ELF debug sections #103867
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `ExtractVector` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Try SimdUnicode for Utf8 validation #103860
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103817
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key same size erases entry if cache is full #102420
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Handle TYP_DOUBLE on arm softFP similarly to TYP_LONG #103869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • JIT: Clean up liveness #103809
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Pass RID to msbuild task #103508
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use SRM's TypeName parser in ILLink #103740
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • update parsing for manually configured proxy on Windows #103328
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2481441 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Check for call interference when placing PUTARG nodes #103301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Convert some more array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.Splice() #103567
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • CI test #103646
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103766
    arch-wasm, os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Improve perf of CredentialCache.GetCredential #103714
    area-System.Net.Http
  • refactore private DistinctIterator for Distinct of linq #103863
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix the Syndication Feed RFC822 DateTimeParser #99194
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Set AnyCPU for ProjectReference to source generators #103819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix alpine debug build #103871
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation in `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #103856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Guard remaining IErrorInfo usage under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #103510
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't use direct wrapper when invoking cctors, so all cctors can share one wrapper #102375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tweak SDK Container insecure registry support to allow subdomains #41771
  • [Feature Request]: warn if a pack-target assembly property is set but GenerateAssemblyInfo is False #41770
  • VersionGreaterThanOrEquals error on dotnet build #41756
  • Dotnet core Oracle 23c SSL connection not working on Linux environment and works on Windows #41751

PullRequests

Created

  • Mess around with the retry logic to help pinpoint the templating time… #41774
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try out a different retry logic to see the impact to the template tests #41773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package table for preview 6 #41772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • rename SDK_CONTAINER_* to DOTNET_CONTAINER #41769
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Dispose HttpClient in NugetToolSearchApiRequest #41765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer the portable ILCompiler when publishing for the portable RID on a source-built SDK. #41754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable passed tests with skip attribute set as string #41753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SourceBuiltSdkContainsNativeDebugSymbols for 'ilc'. #41752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged

Updated

  • Containers telemetry #41747
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4xx
  • Avoid reinstall tool already installed #41746
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workaround for VersionOption initializing to null on Mono. #41690
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Minimize container dependency redistribution #41740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating useless .dll.configs #41738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish notes from extensions WG 2024-06-21 #8238

Merged

  • Add notes for extensions WG 2024-06-14 #8217
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #8220
  • Update first-class Span speclet #8221

Updated

  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209
  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegexGenerator throwing error CS0165: Use of unassigned local variable. #74133
  • Test Plan for Overload Resolution Priority #74131
  • empty string vs. null string #74126
  • Tools > Options does not indicate code style options are ignored when EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is true #74122
  • CS8625 code fix fails when declaration to fix is in another file #74121
  • Symbol.ToDisplayString(SymbolDisplayFormat.FullyQualifiedFormat) does not escape everything it should #74117

Closed

  • Collection expressions: Suboptimal codegen when concatenating static lists #73856
  • Visual Studio 2022 makes double quote escaped when pasting copied text #66441
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Consume new Razor EA #74134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move PEPropertySymbol to use the same UncommonFields pattern that PEMethodSymbol uses #74132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add weak heuristics in our designer scanning code to improve experience during things like configuration switch. #74130
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add overload resolution priority status #74128
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Escaping also considers record structs #74125
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update config for snap #74119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge main to roles #74123
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74120
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11 P3

Updated

  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not store temp of ref conditional operator by value #74116
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid re-running all codeaction requests at low priority. #74083
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove copilot analysis code #74111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle early attribute required members cycle #74110
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Enable some type test scenarios involving ref like type parameters #74102
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Sign `VSSetup/Installer/Roslyn_Preview.zip` #74103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor projects won't load on .NET 9 Preview 5 #56438
  • Improve diagnostics on incorrect GridSort specification in QuickGrid #56437
  • Duplicate Accept-Ranges Header when using MapStaticAssets #56436
  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden on SignalR Hubs, Razor Pages, and Razor Components #56435
  • .NET 9 Preview 5 WebAssembly debugging broken #56433
  • Blazor app doesn't work with older browsers #56432
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56431
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, single_query #56430
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext #56429
  • Output caching middleware caches empty response body when request cancelled #56427
  • Deprecate WebEncoders #56426
  • Setting the SignalR JSON encoder to JavaScriptEncoder.Default does not have any effect #56419
  • Blazor binding not working properly with inheritance and computed properties (?) #56417
  • The path must be absolute. (Parameter 'root') #56416

Closed

  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56418
  • Perf regression: json #56407
  • Make EventCallback returnable like Func<in, out> #56425
  • Perf improvement: json #56412

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24323.5 #56421
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix check for form parameters that don't need complex binding in RDG #56332
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up nullability and primitive type handing in schema generation #56372
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as FrozenDictionary instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Don't use diagnostics memory pool in GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #56281
    area-networking
  • Revert "Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner" #56343
    area-mvc
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [test failure] TestCounterMonitorSystemRuntimeMetricsCSV intermittently fails: System.IO.EndOfStreamException : Attempted to read past the end of the stream. #4757
  • [test failure] SOS.WebApp3 fails on Alpine with VerifyOutput: no last command output or debugger exited unexpectedly: \s*Statistics:\s+ #4755
  • SOS Warning: Loading symbols for dynamic assemblies is not yet supported #4753
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • .net9+: prefer the canonical method table over EEClass #4758

Merged

  • Replace account based SAS with dSAS #4756
  • Remove printing of DacpModuleData::PEAssembly from DumpModule command #4751

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate Default Style Behaves Strangely #23225
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items #23220
  • FontImage not support woff2 format #23217
    Backlog
  • Flyout text dissappears after locking the screen #23214
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Margin and Padding don't work in CollectionView #23211
    Backlog
  • App refused by Apple with error ITMS-90338: Non-public API usage #23210
  • When in the Shell, HideSoftInputOnTapped does not work at Navigation.PushAsync(animated: false) in TapGestureRecognizer #23206
    Backlog

Closed

  • Setting a Style With TargetType="Border" Faults at Run Time #22862
    Backlog
  • Picking a lot of files with FilePicker is extremely slow on Windows, and can raise access exceptions on iOS #19868
    Backlog
  • Regression Issue: CollectionView SizeChanged does not work in SR6 but it works in SR5 (.NET 8) #23029
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Bad performance while using OData client vs using HttpClient on Android #23185
  • Installing MAUI workloads on Linux fails on read-only filesystems such as Flatpak #23219
  • [Windows] [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] App icon in the taskbar is pixelated #23212
  • [NET9] JavaCast not currently working on NET9 #23205
    9.0-preview6
  • iOS iPad Entry Control: Tab on an external keyboard does not move between UI Elements #20135
    Backlog
  • Error when trying to run myfirstapp on pixel device emulation #23192
  • I wanna create my self predictor aviator #23203
  • Looking for AndroidManifest.xml in /Android folder instead of /Platforms/Android #23207
  • App FlowDirection is restricted to device flow direction and doesn't respond to any changes #19506
  • Radio Button and CollectionView together do not work correctly #22913
  • [Logging] Logs with "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.xxxx" as namespace tossing off Warnings anyway. #22730
  • Crash on Android when hold app over 2 minutes in background #22284
  • Ambiguous route when PopModalAsync #21577

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete IBorder #23224
  • Renamed the project because macOS uses .app #23223
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    community ✨
  • Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2151.40` to `1.0.2592.51` #23209
    area-blazor, community ✨

Merged

  • VSCode no longer uses MAUI to launch #23222
  • Call base.OnResume if Existing NavigationFragment Early #23187
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow (#23169) #23218
  • Wire RefreshView up to our xplat layout workflow #23169
  • Simplify Development.md #23142
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • Avoid JavaCast + exceptions and instead just ask Java #23215
  • [iOS] Set WindowOverlay's GraphicsView to transparent input #23208
  • 8.0.61 release branding #23204

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Obsolete Frame for NET9 in favor of Border #23184
    t/docs 📝, area-controls-frame
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • Fixes #18204 border lagging behind content on iOS and improves initial render performance #23156
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
    area-infrastructure
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [Android] Android Ecosystem version bumps #23117
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] fix TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped fired multiple times on Android #23183
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Page and control Unloaded events - fix #23196
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scalar collections: stop expanding bare arrays to a subquery when ToList() is composed on top #34081
    Backlog
  • EFC8 Contains with ROWGUIDCOL #34079
  • Unable to cascade delete when circular dependency is in context #34076
  • Support SQLite jsonb #34073
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cosmos: Support projecting out (primitive) collections #33797
    9.0.0
  • Query: Bitwise Ex-Or support #16645
    9.0.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Use XOR to translate some NOT expressions #34080
  • Implement Cosmos alias management #34074

Merged

  • Cosmos: Fixes around array projection #34061
  • Fix build regression from #34002 #34078
  • Small: Report cross-document join exception on Cosmos, and some test cleanup #34066
  • Optimize away Coalesce for trivial cases #34002
  • Implement translation for XOR #34071

Updated

  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
  • Fix `Nullable<T>.ToString()` #34014
  • Simplify and improve null semantics rewrites #34072

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19919
